attributes.action: Include part time workers in the statutory sick pay during Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair on young workers or part time workers trying to support their families if they are not getting paid during Coronavirus because of isolation
attributes.background: To help support young and part time workers who are trying to make an income to help them and their families

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300336

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
